description: Creates a binary mask from a FITS image

parameters.info: Name of FITS image from which to derive the mask
parameters.name: image

parameters.info: The number of standard deviations to use when clipping image
parameters.name: sigma

parameters.info: Will divide image into this number of boxes, then perform sigma clipping in each of these boxes
parameters.name: boxes

parameters.info: The number of iterations to perform sigma clipping, or 0 to clip until convergence is achieved.
parameters.name: iters

parameters.info: Value to use for masked regions
parameters.name: mask-value

parameters.info: Overlap region. As a fraction of -nb/--boxes
parameters.name: overlap

parameters.info: Dilate mask. This is an attempt to include low surface brightness in an image.
parameters.name: dilate

parameters.info: Include negative pixels when creating mask
parameters.name: no-negative

parameters.info: Tolerance for dilating the mask. Will stop dilating if percentage difference between dilations is smaller than this value.
parameters.name: tolerance

parameters.info: Clip image based on this fraction of the peak pixel in the image. Will ingore sigma option
parameters.name: peak-fraction
